mapper.insert: insert into accom_service values((select nvl(max(accom_service_number)+1,0) from accom_service),#{cate_number},#{user_accom_boss_name},#{accom_name},#{accom_addr})

insert into accom_info values((select nvl(max(accom_info_number)+1,0) from accom_info),(select nvl(max(accom_service_number),0) from accom_service),#{accom_info_content},#{accom_how},#{accom_rule},#{accom_chekinfo},#{facility},#{conven})
insert into image values((select nvl(max(img_num)+1,0) from image),#{imgorgname},#{imgsavename},(select nvl(max(accom_service_number),0) from accom_service), #{cate_number})
mapper.update: update accom_service set cate_number=#{cate_number}, accom_name=#{accom_name}, accom_addr=#{accom_addr} where accom_service_number=#{accom_service_number}

update accom_service set accom_info_content=#{accom_info_content}, accom_how=#{accom_how}, accom_rule=#{accom_rule}, accom_chekinfo=#{accom_chekinfo}, facility=#{facility}, conven=#{conven} where accom_service_number=#{accom_service_number}
mapper.delete: delete from image where general_number=#{general_number} and cate_number=#{cate_number}
